name: 黃如瑩
objective:
一. 本課程目的在於為大學部同學(1)導讀當今英語世界正在流行的小說或長短篇故事,分析作品在文字與主題上的特色,以擴大同學閱讀英語作品能力與眼界,(2)介紹由這些作品改編的電影片段,訓練同學聆聽英語電影裡英語對話的能力,同時提升語文程度與文化涵養,(3)培養完成閱讀整本英語小說的能力與習慣,並且可以獨立賞析,與人用英語分析討論,寫報告,或發表演講.
二. 課程進行內容為(1)教授每周導讀並引介一本(或一套)流行小說,帶領同學閱讀原文小說精彩情節(節選)並觀賞改編電影精彩片段,(2)教授在課堂上闡述該作品在語言與文化上的特點,並設計教學活動訓練同學的聽說讀寫能力,並藉由討論與問答訓練同學的思辨能力與英語口語表達,(3)每位同學選擇一本自己喜歡的流行小說,期中考前與期末考前與教授約時間作兩次個人口頭報告,與教授討論情節並在期末報告寫下自己對作品的剖析.
schedule:
Syllabus 課程表:
Theme One: Love, Death, and Life
Week 1: Introduction, Beauty and the Beast
Week 2: A Monster Calls
Week 3: Me before You
Week 4: The Fault in Our Stars
Week 5: The Danish Girl
Week 6: Miss Peregrine's Home for  Peculiar Children
Theme Two:  The Girl and the Mystery
Week 7: Gone Girl
Week 8: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoos
Week 9: The Girl with the Pearl Earring
Week 10: Divergent
Week 11: Brooklyn
Theme Three: The Boy/Man’s Adventure
Week 12: The Giver
Week 13: The Maze Runner
Week 14: The Inferno
Week 15: The Martian
Week 16: Interstellar
Week 17: The Imitation Game
Week 18: A Slight Trick of the Mind

Percentile of final grades 成績配分:
1. Group presentation in the class: 5 % X 3 = 15 %
2. Individual tasks (homework, solo presentation, FB comments): 
3 % X 15 = 45 %
3. Novel reading and discussions with Vinia: 10% X 2 = 20 %
4. Attendance and participation: 20 % (- 4 % each absence)
scorePolicy:
Percentile distribution of final grades評分百分比:
1. Attendance and participation in classroom discussions: 15 X 2% = 30%
2. Weekly tests:  15% X 2 = 30%
3. Homework: 1% X 10 = 10%
3. Two oral reports on the novel of your choice: 10% X 2= 20%
4. Final paper on the novel of your choice: 10%
